class.name: SkeletonModifier3D
class.brief_description: A Node that may modify Skeleton3D's bone.
class.description: [SkeletonModifier3D] retrieves a target [Skeleton3D] by either having a [Skeleton3D] parent or set [member external_skeleton]. Also, if [member target_animation_mixer] is set, it is possible to process the animation in the same process as the [AnimationMixer]. At this time, [method SkeletonModifier3D._process_modification] always performs after playback process of the [AnimationMixer].

method.name: _process_modification
method.description: This method can be registered with [AnimationMixer] by [method AnimationMixer.add_post_process]. You should do things like get the [Skeleton3D]'s current pose and apply the pose here.

method.name: advance
method.description: Manually advance the modifications by the specified time (in seconds).

members.member: The process notification in which to update modifications. If you use [SkeletonModifier3D] at the same time as [AnimationMixer], you need to match this property between them or set [member target_animation_mixer].
Sets the [NodePath] to the external [Skeleton3D] that the [SkeletonModifier3D] node should use instead of the parent [Skeleton3D].
Sets the [NodePath] to the target [AnimationMixer]. [SkeletonModifier3D] has the same update process with that.

signal.name: modification_processed
signal.description: Notifies when the modification have been finished.
